fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation

Interface IRankedServiceTracker<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - service type to track and rank.

    public interface IRankedServiceTracker<S>
    Tracks and ranks instances of a specified service interface.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    createRankedServiceTracker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this tracker instance.
      List<IRankedService<S>> getRankedServices()
      Gets an ordered (and thread-safe) list of ranked services of the specified type.

    • Method Detail

      • getRankedServices

        List<IRankedService<S>> getRankedServices()
        Gets an ordered (and thread-safe) list of ranked services of the specified type.

        Sorting is primarily based on the service ranking. Additional sorting may performed, if required, when the referent implements IAttachable and defines a version; the highest version will have the highest priority. If further comparison is required, then the element with the highest OSGi service.id will be returned first.

        Returns:
        a non-null (possibly empty) ordered (and thread-safe) list of ranked services.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IRankedService.getService(), IRankedService.getRanking(), IRankedService.getId()

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this tracker instance. Stops tracking services and removes all listeners.
        Since:
        1.0
